articles.title: How WVU vaulted up the team rankings in one month - 247Sports
articles.description: One month ago, West Virginia had only three commitments in the 2024 recruiting class and sat 74th in the 247Sports Team Rankings as one of the worst Power Five teams in the nation. That changed in a big way in the last month.
